name: Tambola Adda
short_description:
Tambola is another name for the game of Bingo, Housey, or Housie. The name varies in different regions of the world. It is called Tambola in India. This is a fun ticket game and one of the favorite family party games. This game can be played with any number of players.

 Tambola Adda is an interactive application to enable people to play Tambola in an easier way with out the need of board and the application has a virtual board. This application can be used at any place where you have Windows PC. In clubs it can be run on a Projector display and the game board can be seen by all the players. This number calling game's simple layout makes it more easier to use and understand.
summary: Tambola Adda - A free game for Home parties and Clubs

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All 32-bit MS Windows (95/98/NT/2000/XP)
